r.s: Manipulate many kinds of password files
r.d: Provides methods to manipulate standard Unix, SMB server, AuthUser (.htpasswd), AuthDigest (.htdigest), CVS pserver and custom formatted password files.
r.n:
* Fixed reference handling in File_Passwd_Unix::_genPass() (PHP5) * Fixed typo in File_Passwd_Unix::changePasswd() (PEAR_Error)
* Updated License to PHP License 3.0 * Made dependency to Crypt_CHAP for File_Passwd_Smb optional * Added optional dependency to PHP >= 4.3.0 for SHA encryption
* File_Passwd: o added crypt_plain() for plaintext passwds o added FILE_PASSWD_PLAIN for plaintext passwd
* Added File_Passwd_Custom for custom formatted passwd files
